mapper.select:
SELECT A.G_KEY, B.PRICE_KEY, B.KIND, B.PRICE, B.SELL_PRICE, B.POINT, A.NAME as goodsName, A.TYPE, A.IS_FREEBIE_DELIVERY_FREE, C.PM_TYPE FROM T_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PROMOTION C ON A.G_KEY = C.G_KEY WHERE 1=1 AND A.G_KEY IN
#{gKey}

SELECT A.G_KEY, B.PRICE_KEY, B.KIND, B.PRICE, B.SELL_PRICE, B.POINT, A.NAME as goodsName, A.TYPE, A.IS_FREEBIE_DELIVERY_FREE, 0 as PM_TYPE FROM T_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY WHERE 1=1 AND A.G_KEY = #{gKey} AND B.PRICE_KEY = #{priceKey}

SELECT A.G_KEY, B.PRICE_KEY, B.KIND, B.PRICE, B.SELL_PRICE, B.POINT, A.NAME as goodsName, A.TYPE, A.IS_FREEBIE_DELIVERY_FREE, 0 as PM_TYPE FROM T_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY WHERE 1=1 AND A.G_KEY IN ( SELECT G_KEY FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS WHERE CTG_KEY = #{ctgKey} ) ORDER BY A.EMPHASIS DESC, B.KIND DESC

SELECT J_KEY, PRICE, PRICE_PAY, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as INDATE, PAY_STATUS, J_ID, IS_CANCEL_REQUEST FROM T_ORDER WHERE USER_KEY = #{userKey}
AND TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND PAY_STATUS < 10
ORDER BY J_KEY DESC
SELECT B.NAME FROM T_ORDER_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY WHERE A.J_KEY = #{jKey} AND A.J_PM_KEY = 0
SELECT A.SELL_PRICE, A.CNT, A.TYPE, A.KIND, A.PM_TYPE, B.NAME as goodsName FROM T_ORDER_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY WHERE A.J_KEY = #{jKey} AND A.J_PM_KEY = 0

SELECT DELIVERY_NANE as DeliveryName, DELIVERY_TELEPHONE, DELIVERY_TELEPHONE_MOBILE, DELIVERY_EMAIL, DELIVERY_ZIPCODE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ROAD, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ADD FROM T_ORDER WHERE J_KEY = #{jKey}

SELECT A.PAY_STATUS, A.PAY_TYPE, B.STATUS, B.DELIVERY_NO, C.NAME as DELIVERY_COMPANY_NAME, C.DELIVERY_MASTER_KEY, A.PRICE_PAY, A.PRICE FROM T_ORDER A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_ORDER_DELIVERY B ON A.J_KEY = B.J_KEY LEFT JOIN T_DELIVERY_MASTER C ON B.DELIVERY_MASTER_KEY = C.DELIVERY_MASTER_KEY WHERE A.J_KEY = #{jKey}
SELECT TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createDate, TYPE, POINT, J_KEY, J_ID, DESC_TYPE FROM T_POINT WHERE USER_KEY = #{userKey} ORDER BY INDATE DESC
SELECT G_KEY, PRICE_KEY, LINK_PRICE, LINK_SELL_PRICE, CTG_KEY FROM T_CART WHERE CART_KEY = #{cartKey}
SELECT COUNT(CART_KEY) FROM T_CART WHERE USER_KEY = #{userKey}

SELECT Z.J_KEY, Z.jId , TRIM ( TO_CHAR(Z.PRICE_PAY, '999,999') ) as sellPriceName, Z.INDATE, Z.orderGoodsName, Z.deliveryStatus, CASE Z.orderGoodsCount WHEN 0 THEN 0 WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE Z.orderGoodsCount END as orderGoodsCount FROM ( SELECT A.J_KEY, A.J_ID as jId, A.PRICE, A.PRICE_PAY, TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as INDATE, A.PAY_STATUS, A.J_ID, A.IS_CANCEL_REQUEST, ( SELECT NAME FROM ( SELECT /*+ PARALLEL(4) */ TT.NAME FROM T_ORDER_GOODS T LEFT JOIN T_GOODS TT ON T.G_KEY = TT.G_KEY WHERE T.J_KEY = A.J_KEY ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) as orderGoodsName, ( SELECT COUNT(J_G_KEY) FROM (SELECT /*+FIRST_ROWS*/ J_G_KEY FROM T_ORDER_GOODS T WHERE T.J_KEY = A.J_KEY and T.PRICE > 0 AND SELL_PRICE > 0 AND PM_TYPE NOT IN (100, 50) ) ) as orderGoodsCount, B.STATUS as deliveryStatus FROM T_ORDER A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_ORDER_DELIVERY B ON A.J_KEY = B.J_KEY WHERE A.USER_KEY = #{userKey}
AND TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.PAY_STATUS = 2 ORDER BY A.J_KEY DESC OFFSET #{startNumber} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listLimitNumber} ROWS ONLY ) Z

SELECT COUNT(A.J_KEY) FROM T_ORDER A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_ORDER_DELIVERY B ON A.J_KEY = B.J_KEY WHERE A.USER_KEY = #{userKey}
AND TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.PAY_STATUS = 2 ORDER BY A.J_KEY DESC

SELECT A.USER_KEY, C.NAME as goodsName, A.J_KEY, A.TYPE, A.J_G_KEY, D.J_LEC_KEY, B.PAY_TYPE FROM T_ORDER_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_ORDER B ON A.J_KEY = B.J_KEY LEFT JOIN T_GOODS C ON A.G_KEY = C.G_KEY LEFT JOIN T_ORDER_LEC D ON A.J_G_KEY = D.J_G_KEY WHERE 1=1 AND A.J_PM_KEY = 0 AND A.J_KEY = #{jKey}
mapper.insert:
SELECT T_CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO T_CART ( CART_KEY, C_KEY, INDATE, USER_KEY, G_KEY, PRICE_KEY, GROUP_ID, IS_DELETE, IS_DIRECT, IS_MEMBER, J_ID, CNT, FREEBIE_PARENT_KEY, LINK_PRICE, LINK_SELL_PRICE, LINK_POINT, EXTEND_DAY, CTG_KEY, SITE_NAME ) VALUES ( #{cartKey}, #{cKey}, sysdate, #{userKey}, #{gKey}, #{priceKey}, #{groupId}, #{isDelete}, #{isDirect}, #{isMember}, #{jId}, #{cnt}, #{freebieParentKey}, #{linkPrice}, #{linkSellPrice}, #{linkPoint}, #{extendDay}, #{ctgKey}, #{siteName} )

SELECT T_ORDER_PROMOTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO T_ORDER_PROMOTION ( J_PM_KEY, J_G_KEY, INDATE, PM_TYPE, START_DT, END_DT ) VALUES ( #{jPmKey}, #{jGKey}, sysdate, #{pmType}, sysdate, sysdate )
